definition: confused/dirty/to mix/muddy/variant of 渾|浑[hun2]
to mix/to mingle/muddled/to drift along/to muddle along/to pass for/to get along with sb/thoughtless/reckless
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
descendant/elder brother/a style of Chinese poetry
confusion/chaos/disorder
to mix/to blend/hybrid/composite
concrete
to obscure/to confuse/to mix up/to blur/to mislead
chaotic warfare/confused fighting/melee/to join in such fighting
to mix/to mingle
medley (swimming)
primal chaos/formless mass before creation in Chinese mythology/muddled/innocent as a baby

lit. fish and dragons mixed in together (idiom); fig. crooks mixed in with the honest folk
mixed in as part of a community/hiding one's identity/occupying a position while not deserving it

sentences.chinese: 因此，混搭你自己的百搭果仁吧。

sentences.english: The types and homogenizing principles of blending silos were described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了粉體混料倉的型式及摻混原理。

sentences.english: Do you think we can sponge a meal from your parents?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲我們能從你父母那兒不混頓飯吃了嗎？

sentences.english: He would order 300 musicians at a time to play the Yu for him.
sentences.chinese: 有一個南郭先生，本來不會吹竽，也混在中間湊數。

sentences.english: Those college girls went slumming and came home with sex diseases.
sentences.chinese: 那些大學女生跟下流的人“胡”混，帶回了性病。

sentences.english: Chemical features of these granites are consistent with silicate liquid immiscibility.
sentences.chinese: 它們的化學特徵可以用硅酸鹽液態不混熔來解釋。

sentences.english: Everything in my suitcase was jumbled together.
sentences.chinese: 我手提箱裏的一切都混在一起了。

sentences.english: The scanning electronic microscope results showed that double screw blending was better than single screw blending.
sentences.chinese: 雙螺桿共混擠出，掃描電鏡觀察兩相混合效果很好。

sentences.english: Aware of the poor in society, mixed with the bitterness of Kula .
sentences.chinese: 知道窮人在社會中混的辛酸苦辣。

sentences.english: The utility model fills the blank of the special tank car for transporting the bulk dry-mixed mortar in China.
sentences.chinese: 填補了國內幹混砂漿無散裝運輸專用罐車的空白。

sentences.english: Fear, mixed with a feeling of uncertainty, suddenly overwhelmed me.
sentences.chinese: 恐懼，混有一種感覺的不確定性，突然淹沒了我。

sentences.english: He posed as a newsman to get in.
The invention relates to a moguisteine dried suspension and a preparation method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種莫吉司坦幹混懸劑及其製備方法。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the antibacterial effects in vitro and protective effects in vivo of Roxithromycin dry suspension.
sentences.chinese: 研究羅紅黴素幹混懸劑體外抗菌作用及體內保護作用。

sentences.english: smiles for both groups of salesclerks. When the students were
sentences.chinese: 事實上，科學家在兩組店員中混搭了真假微笑。

sentences.english: The PEG slowed down the decreasing of blende…
sentences.chinese: PEG的引入能減緩共混纖維力學性能的下降。

to idle/to waste time
to amalgamate/to mix together as one

to be popular/to be getting on well/much in demand
hoodlum/person unfit for society
to work for a living
popular/in demand/well regarded
like a fish back in water (idiom); glad to be back in one's proper surroundings
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
